Identification.ShortTitle: Order Acknowledging Receipt of the Assessments Done Pursuant to Subsection 23(1) of the Act

Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of the Environment, acknowledges receipt, on the making of this Order, of the assessments done pursuant to subsection 23(1) of the Species at Risk Acta by the Committee on the Status of Endangered Wildlife in Canada (COSEWIC) with respect to the species set out in the annexed schedule.

BilingualGroup.BilingualItemEn: Mussel, Mapleleaf (Quadrula quadrula) Saskatchewan – Nelson population
BilingualGroup.BilingualItemFr: Mulette feuille d’érable population de la Saskatchewan – Nelson

BilingualGroup.BilingualItemEn: Bass, Striped (Morone saxatilis) Southern Gulf of St. Lawrence population
BilingualGroup.BilingualItemFr: Bar rayé population du Sud du golfe Saint-Laurent
BilingualGroup.BilingualItemEn: Darter, Eastern Sand (Ammocrypta pellucida) Ontario populations
BilingualGroup.BilingualItemFr: Dard de sable populations de l’Ontario
BilingualGroup.BilingualItemEn: Darter, Eastern Sand (Ammocrypta pellucida) Quebec populations
BilingualGroup.BilingualItemFr: Dard de sable populations du Québec
BilingualGroup.BilingualItemEn: Eulachon (Thaleichthys pacificus) Nass and Skeena Rivers populations
BilingualGroup.BilingualItemFr: Eulakane populations des rivières Nass et Skeena
BilingualGroup.BilingualItemEn: Trout, Westslope Cutthroat (Oncorhynchus clarkii lewisi) Alberta population
BilingualGroup.BilingualItemFr: Truite fardée versant de I’Ouest population de l’Alberta

BilingualGroup.BilingualItemEn: Mussel, Mapleleaf (Quadrula quadrula) Great Lakes – Western St. Lawrence population
BilingualGroup.BilingualItemFr: Mulette feuille d’érable population des Grands Lacs – Ouest du Saint-Laurent

BilingualGroup.BilingualItemEn: Whale, Beluga (Delphinapterus leucas) Eastern High Arctic and Baffin Bay populations
BilingualGroup.BilingualItemFr: Béluga populations de l’Est du Haut-Arctique et de la baie de Baffin
BilingualGroup.BilingualItemEn: Whale, Humpback (Megaptera novaeangliae) North Pacific population
BilingualGroup.BilingualItemFr: Rorqual à bosse population du Pacifique Nord
